title: Scenario: Loading the page on various devices
custom_preconds:
Given
Having the following devices: Blackberry(OS 5, OS 6, OS 7 (touch, double wide)). Android (2.2, 2.3). iOS(4, 4S, 4.2.x, 4.3.x, 5). Windows Phone 7 (Mango, non-Mango).
custom_steps:
When
wap.milb.com is navigated to on all devices
custom_expected:
Then
The page will open in under 10 seconds on all devices, and all images and text will load.

title: Scenario: Clicking on the MilB logo in the upper left when one level below MiLB
custom_preconds:
Given
Starting with the URL wap.milb.com and then clicking on any link off that page to be one level below the home page.
custom_steps:
When
Click on the MiLB logo in the upper left corner.
custom_expected:
Then
The URL of the page that opens should be wap.milb.com.

title: Scenario: MiLB footer links
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com or it is a page that is linked directly from wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footer
custom_expected:
Then
The links in the footer should be Scoreboard, Stats, Standings, Teams, ^Go To Top

title: Scenario: Clicking on  scoreboard in the footer
custom_preconds:
Given
The url of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footer 
and
the link for 'scoreboard' is clicked
custom_expected:
Then
The url of the page that opens is http://wap.milb.com/scores/

title: Scenario: Clicking on stats in the footer
custom_preconds:
Given
The url of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footer and the Stats link is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
The Url that opens is http://wap.milb.com/stats/

title: Scenario: clicking on standings in the footer
custom_preconds:
Given
The url of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footer and the Standings link is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
The Url of the page that opens is http://wap.milb.com/standings/

title: Scenario: Clicking on  teams in the footer
custom_preconds:
Given
The url of the page is wap.milb.com.
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the footer and the teams link is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
The URL that opens is http://wap.milb.com/teams/

title: Scenario: The links that are below the footer
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom below the footer.
custom_expected:
Then
The user should see 3 links Terms of Use, Privacy Policy, About MiLB.com

title: Scenario: Clicking on Terms of Use
custom_preconds:
Given
The Url of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom
and
the Terms of Use link is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
The page that opens should be http://wap.milb.com/terms/

title: Scenario: Clicking on Privacy Policy
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
The page is scrolled down to the bottom
and
Privacy Policy is clicked on.
custom_expected:
Then
The URL of the page that opens is http://wap.milb.com/privacy/

title: Scenario: Clicking on About MiLB.com
custom_preconds:
Given
The URL of the page is wap.milb.com
custom_steps:
When
Scroll down to the bottom of the page
and
click on the link About MiLB.com
custom_expected:
Then
The url of the page that opens is http://wapb.milb.com/about/
